org.deeplearning4j.arbiter.optimize.generator.genetic.selection

Class GeneticSelectionOperator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.arbiter.optimize.generator.genetic.selection.SelectionOperator
      • org.deeplearning4j.arbiter.optimize.generator.genetic.selection.GeneticSelectionOperator

  • public class GeneticSelectionOperator
extends SelectionOperator
    A selection operator that will generate random genes initially. Once the population has reached the culled size, will start to generate offsprings of parents selected in the population.
    Author:
    Alexandre Boulanger

                               ChromosomeFactory chromosomeFactory)
        Called by GeneticSearchCandidateGenerator
        Overrides:
        initializeInstance in class SelectionOperator

      • buildNextGenes

        public double[] buildNextGenes()
        Build a new set of genes. Has two distinct modes of operation
        • Before the population has reached the culled size: will return a random set of genes.
        • After: Parents will be selected among the population, a crossover will be applied followed by a mutation.
        Specified by:
        buildNextGenes in class SelectionOperator
        Returns:
        Returns the generated set of genes
        Throws:
        GeneticGenerationException - If buildNextGenes() can't generate a set that has not already been tried, or if the crossover and the mutation operators can't generate a set, this exception is thrown.
